sentence.Network_en: A clever lawyer can cozen the prisoner into an admission of guilt.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个聪明的律师能施小计诱使囚犯承认有罪.

sentence.Network_en: The pretty child could cozen anything out of his old grandfather.
sentence.Network_cn: 那可爱的小孩能从他老祖父那儿骗取任何东西.

sentence.Network_en: Call me cousin, but cozen me out.
sentence.Network_cn: 与我攀亲可以, 但欺骗我可不行.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: perhaps from obsolete Italian cozzonare 'to cheat', from cozzone 'middleman, broker', from Latin cocio 'dealer'

means.word_mean: 1. be false to; be dishonest with

sentences.sentence: "He cozened the money out of the old man"

sentences.en: A clever lawyer can cozen the prisoner into an admission of guilt.
sentences.cn: 一个聪明的律师能施小计诱使囚犯承认有罪。

sentences.en: Her uncle cozened her out of her inheritance.
sentences.cn: 她叔叔诱使她放弃了继承权。
